name: Cloud Diver
description:
★˛-˚+˛*˛°*.˛°-.*★ PROTOTYPE ★˛˚*˛°.˛*˛˛.+*★ ★˛-˚+˛*˛°*.˛°-.*★ PROTOTYPE ★˛˚*˛°.˛*˛˛.+*★      Please help us improve our game by leaving additional feedback through our survey. Thanks and enjoy!

Or via https://forms.gle/cE2PBXCKCo66jvVdA 

👋WELCOME 

Cloud Diver is an endless runner game that takes the player through eye-catching, dreamy scenes. Perfect for everyone - your father, your sister, even your grandmother!

🕹️HOW TO PLAY  

1️⃣Jump from cloud to cloud to pass the sky castles and discover new worlds. On PC, jump by pressing the spacebar.

💡Tip: You can control the jump and glide (long press).

2️⃣Attention❗ Make sure to avoid the birds . . .   

3️⃣Improve your highscores or top that of others!

             

Are you the best cloud diver of all? Play now to find out!

💻STUDIO

6PIX Studio consists of six students at Politecnico di Milano. The studio was established in 2022, for the elective course Videogame Design & Programming (2022-2023).

  • 🎨 Cin Yie Chang  (🇳🇱) ▶️ Project Leader - Artist - Marketing + branding
  • 💻 Javi Arroyo García  (🇪🇸) ▶️ Developer 
  • 💻 Filip Pagliaro  (🇸🇪) ▶️ Developer - Github Manager
  • 💻  Jorge Parra  (🇪🇸) ▶️ Developer - Art help (Backgrounds) 
  • 💻 Constantinos Savvidis (🇫🇷) ▶️ Developer
